Thon is an experienced entrepreneur and a recognized expert in the field of fundraising technology for non-profit organizations. Prior to KIMBIA, Thon served as a member of the senior management team of Sapling Systems, a fast growing startup in the e-learning space and as a National Account Manager at Convio, where he managed several of the companyâ€™s largest accounts and a substantial portion of the companyâ€™s recurring revenue. Earlier in his career, Thon worked as Vice President of Online Services at an early-stage broadband access company where he ran a 15-person content development team and managed partner relationships with companies such as Yahoo! and Microsoft. Thon also founded, built and sold Applied Multimedia Productions, an online content development firm with clients that included Samsonite and Alcatel.
